official_title: To designate the United States courthouse under construction in White Plains, New York, as the "Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse under construction at 300 Quarropas Street in White Plains, New York, as the Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse.

titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse under construction in White Plains, New York, as the "Thurgood Marshall United States Courthouse".
